Topic.Title: Possible Bug with browser-based Quest game creator

Posts.EditableText: I don't know if this has happened to anyone else, but both yesterday AND today, I tried creating a quest game using the web editor but was not able to.

Posts.EditableText: Sorry, have an issue with Quest servers. We are working on this.
